subject: Shifter
description_text: I bought a Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/S from you guys in December 25th, no update or has the package been sent out to me yet. If i dont get a update that it has been sent out 24 hours from the day this message has been sent. I will take my money back and you guys can keep your product. And i will buy a proper shifter, Thank You.

conversations.body_text: Hi Cayden Dombrosky,  As January 1st to 3rd are public holidays, we will begin shipping the HS Pro on January 4th.Â
